meta.title: HelvetiCoin (HCHF) - Swiss-Minted Stability on Ethereum & Tron
meta.description: Experience Swiss precision in digital currency. HelvetiCoin (HCHF) brings the stability of the Swiss Franc to the blockchain ecosystem with professional-grade security and compliance.

hero.headline: Swiss-Minted Stability on Ethereum & Tron
hero.subtitle: Experience the precision of Swiss financial engineering in digital form. HelvetiCoin (HCHF) brings the stability of the Swiss Franc to the decentralized world.

stability.title: Swiss Franc Stability
stability.description: Backed by the strength and stability of the Swiss Franc, one of the world's strongest currencies.

security.title: Bank-Grade Security
security.description: Built with OpenZeppelin contracts and audited by leading security firms for maximum protection.

compliance.title: Regulatory Compliant
compliance.description: Designed to meet Swiss and international regulatory standards with built-in compliance features.

multichain.title: Multi-Chain Support
multichain.description: Available on Ethereum and Tron networks with seamless cross-chain functionality.

roadmap.title: Development Roadmap
roadmap.subtitle: Our journey to bringing Swiss precision to the blockchain
